alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 1:25PM MST until December 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST MONDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Areas of moderate to locally heavy snow above 5000 feet developing by early Monday morning and lasting through Monday evening. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low and Whiteriver. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 5 AM Monday to 11 PM Monday: Alpine 3 to 5 inches Pinetop-Lkside 5 to 9 inches Show Low 4 to 6 inches Whiteriver 2 to 4 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
